reviewText: This movie was incredible. So moving and touching and it really makes you feel grateful for the health and safety of all of your loved ones.  Highly recommend this movie.

wonderful movie about a family who"s son is in a car accident by a drunk driver. It shows how the family fights for justice. Wonderful cast and story. Dramatic,sad ,courage,uplifting,buy this and see it,its worth it,
This was a wonderful movie one every one should see especially one who thinks they can get away with hurting someone
